lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit

wikiData.title: McFadden v. United States
wikiData.FullName: Stephen Dominick McFadden, Petitioner v. United States
wikiData.Prior: ''United States v. McFadden'', 15 [[F. Supp. 3d]] [https://www.leagle.com/decision/inadvfdco150212000344 668] ([[United States District Court for the Western District of Virginia|W.D. Va.]] 2013); affirmed, 753 [[F.3d]] [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infco20140521102 432] ([[United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit|4th Cir.]] 2014); [[Certiorari|cert.]] granted, 135 S. Ct. 2298 (2015).
wikiData.Holding: Under §841(a)(1) of the [[Controlled Substances Act]], the government must prove the defendant knew he was dealing with a controlled substance when it is an analogue. [[United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit]] vacated and [[remanded]].
wikiData.JoinMajority: Scalia, Kennedy, Ginsburg, Breyer, Alito, Sotomayor, Kagan
